abstract: Tony Fadell, one of the creators of the iPod and iPhone, is breaking off his nine-year affiliation with Apple.
snippet: Tony Fadell, one of the creators of the iPod and iPhone, is breaking off his nine-year affiliation with Apple.
lead_paragraph: An era is formally ending at Apple. Tony Fadell, one of the creators of the iPod and iPhone, is breaking off his nine-year affiliation with Steve Jobs & Co.

headline.main: Godfather of iPod Severs Final Ties With Apple
